title: How grid operators and planners are combining measurement and modeling to maintain resilience
description: Duncan Burt of Reactive Technologies and FPL's Dr. Andrew Arana discuss changing power grid dynamics in a Factor This webcast, highlighting the need for improved measurement and modeling.
content: Duncan Burt of Reactive Technologies and FPL's Dr. Andrew Arana discuss changing power grid dynamics in a Factor This webcast, highlighting the need for improved measurement and modeling.
